welcome.title: Welcome to Table – Habit Tracker
welcome.message:
Table is a habit tracker that helps you daily track the completion of important tasks and form sustainable habits.

You add habits that need to be performed regularly (every day or several times a week): for example, "wake up on time", "do exercises", "go to workout", "study Russian".

Every day you mark:

— completed (filled marker);

— not completed (leave empty);

— skip (cross – the day doesn't count if the task wasn't required, for example, workout every other day);

At the end of the month, the app shows:

  • – completion percentage for each habit and overall average;
  • – grade on a 5-point scale;
  • – archive of all past months for progress comparison.

Convenient to print: the table can be printed in a clean form — without buttons and interface. Hang it on the fridge or wall, mark with a pencil throughout the month, and at the end — enter all data into the app. This way you save the archive and get statistics.

It was thanks to the paper version that this app appeared; I needed an archive and statistics calculation.

Everything is saved locally in the browser, you can export and import data.

A simple table is a visual way to see where you keep the rhythm and where you need to improve.
